author: Special Correspondent
text:
The district administration will extend all support to schools which need additional facilities for improving the pass percentage in the public examination, said K. Nandakumar, District Collector.

Addressing headmasters and headmistress of high and higher secondary schools for improving the results of the public examination for SSLC and Plus Two courses to be held in March and April this year, he said the district had been registering progress in terms of results in the public examinations.

Analysing the district’s rank in the State-level scenario, he said the district had improved from the 15th to the 5th for the SSLC public examination while the district has stabilised from fifth to second position in the Plus Two courses.
title: Collector meets headmasters
